system.description: The Sister of Battle's unwavering faith empowers her flame weapons, ensuring that the fires of righteousness burn with divine intensity.
system.benefit: When attacking with a weapon that has the Flame Quality, the Sister can re-roll any results lower than their Willpower Bonus on damage rolls.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Ballistic Skill 40

specialAbilities.name: Faith-Empowered Flames
specialAbilities.description: When attacking with a weapon that has the Flame Quality, re-roll any damage die results lower than Willpower Bonus.
